name: S3 Media
tagline: S3 Media is an Interactive Marketing Firm
description:
S3 Media is an Interactive Marketing Firm located in Tampa, Florida for companies looking to find new avenues of marketing, web design, logo design and brand development. They work with you to determine your product/service offerings and long-term business objectives so they can drive the targeted traffic to your business to capture your ideal prospect and convert the prospect into a new client.
All marketing strategies are to implement a marketing solution that helps meet your company goals.
